books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the events surrounding the attempted assassination of President Reagan in 1981.
books.name: KILLING REAGAN

books.author: by Brian Kilmeade and Don Yaeger
books.description: The war against the Barbary pirates in 1801.
books.name: THOMAS JEFFERSON AND THE TRIPOLI PIRATES

books.author: by Brandon Stanton
books.description: Photographs and interviews from the creator of the blog and the book “Humans of New York.”
books.name: HUMANS OF NEW YORK: STORIES

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A meditation on race in America as well as a personal story by the Atlantic's national correspondent.
books.name: BETWEEN THE WORLD AND ME

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Randall Munroe
books.description: Scientific (but often funny) answers to hypothetical questions, based in part on the author’s website, xkcd.com.
books.name: WHAT IF?

books.author: by David McCullough
books.description: The story of the bicycle mechanics from Ohio who ushered in the age of flight.
books.name: THE WRIGHT BROTHERS

books.author: by Jon Meacham
books.description: A biography of George H.W. Bush.
books.name: DESTINY AND POWER

books.author: by Mindy Kaling
books.description: More personal essays from the comedian and actress.
books.name: WHY NOT ME?

books.author: by Mary Beard
books.description: A concise history of ancient Rome.
books.name: SPQR

books.author: by Michael Lewis
books.description: The people who saw the real estate crash coming and made billions from their foresight.
books.name: THE BIG SHORT

books.author: by Malala Yousafzai with Christina Lamb
books.description: The experience of the Pakistani girl who advocated for women’s education and was shot by the Taliban.
books.name: I AM MALALA

books.author: by Amy Poehler
books.description: A humorous miscellany from the comedian and actress.
books.name: YES PLEASE

books.author: by Stacy Schiff
books.description: An account of the Salem witch trials of 1692.
books.name: THE WITCHES
